ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisFix the salary of KAREN R. MOCK, former Executive Director, Canadian Race Relations Foundation, for the period commencing April 1, 2003 and terminating March 31, 2004 and for the period commencing April 1, 2004 and terminating October 14, 2005.
